title: Essay on Criticism - suggests the more one knows

content.question: In lines 1-18, the speaker suggests that the more one knows

choices.label: the more one finds there is to know
the more creative one is likely to become
the better one is able to evaluate art

content.answer: the more one finds there is to know

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
